waitingForHostToStart: Waiting for host to start the game
enterUsername: Please enter a username to continue
info1: Free geography game where you explore your surroundings, and try to guess where in the World you are
info2: Use the map to place your guess and check your accuracy.
info3: Learn geography through play, and have fun!
loginWithGoogle2: to earn XP and track your progress
shortDescMeta: Free Geoguessr alternative with unlimited rounds and fun multiplayer modes. Discover new places and learn geography in this game.
fullDescMeta: Free Geoguessr alternative with unlimited rounds and fun multiplayer modes. Explore the world in this game with unlimited rounds! Learn geography and rise up the leaderboard while exploring the world in WorldGuessr.
subtitle: Imagine being dropped in a random location on Earth. Can you guess where you are?
trackYourProgress1: Link with Google to earn XP and track your progress
addFriendDesc: Add a friend to play together
addFriendDescription: Add a friend to play together
friendReqNotAccepting: This user is not accepting friend requests
alreadyFriends: You are already friends with this user
onboarding2: You are in a random location. Can you figure out where you are?
onboarding3: Place a pin on the map where you think you are. The closer you are, the more points you get.
onboarding4: Use the hint to get a general idea of where you are. Good luck!
onboarding5: Now, lets add a timer to make things more interesting.
onboarding10: The more you play, the more you learn!
onboardingTimeEnd: You forgot to guess within the time. Pay attention!
inviteCooldown: You can invite this user in {{t}} seconds
alreadyInYourGame: User is already in your game
pleaseWaitSeconds: Please wait {{seconds}} seconds to perform this action
lastGuesser: You are the last guesser. Timer reduced to {{s}} seconds
streakLost: Daily login streak lost. Come back tomorrow to grow it!
streakGained: You have a {{streak}} day login streak! Keep it up!
streakStarted: You have a 1 day login streak! Log in daily to grow your streak!
watchAnAdToRestore: Watch a short ad to restore your streak.
notEnoughLocationsInMap: Not enough locations in this map. There will be repeats.
yourTooFastForUs: You're too fast for us! Please slow down.
watchingAdsSupport: Ads help us run the game and keep it free for everyone. Thank you for your support!
videoAdThanks: Thanks for helping us keep WorldGuessr free by watching video ads!
enjoyGameplay: Enjoy 30 minutes of uninterrupted gameplay after this ad break
joinDiscordDesc: Join our community and improve your WorldGuessr skills!
maintenanceModeStarted: WorldGuessr is currently in maintenance mode. Some features may be disabled.
maintenanceModeEnded: Maintenance mode has ended. Enjoy a full WorldGuessr experience!
leagueModalDesc: Play duels to gain ELO and climb the leaderboard.
leagueModalDesc2: Stats may be delayed up to 1 hour
unableToJoinDuel: Unable to find duel at this time. Please email support@worldguessr.com
